title: Nez Perce National Historical Park: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved       Looking for how to get involved at Nez Perce? Browse through the website navigation or use the search tool to find opportunities.   NPS Centennial The National Park Service turns 100 on August 25, 2016. As we lead up to the centennial, we invite you to participate in Find Your Park Experiences to learn, discover, be inspired, or simply have fun in national parks.    Partners Nez Perce National Historical Park has a host of partners across the region that provide advice and assistance in managing certain sites in the park. At every level, tribal govenments, other federal agencies, and local institutions provide advice and assistance in preserving and protecting sites associated with the history and culture of the Nez Perce.  Volunteer At Nez Perce National Historical Park and Big Hole National Battlefield, volunteers help out at the parks visitor centers, do programs for visitors and children, and even help out in natural resource projects.   Work With Us The best place to find jobs in the National Park Service and the Federal Government is on the world wide web.  Planning  To anticipate the needs of the future, the National Park Service provides a variety of tools to deal with present challenges and what is on the horizon.
